__TOC__

Michael Hall has been working in software development for 10 years.  He has been a Desktop Linux user for 6 years, the last 4 being on Ubuntu.  He is the main developer of Qimo, an Ubuntu-derived Linux Distribution for kids.  He currently spends his days doing Python development for the Moffitt Cancer Research Center in Tampa, FL.
